languages.text: "Черное сердце управляется множеством архонтов, мон-кай. Если ты рассчитывал, что гибель одного станет причиной разрушения всего кабала... то я рад тебя разочаровать".
"The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."
languages.original_text: "Черное сердце управляется множеством архонтов, мон-кай. Если ты рассчитывал, что гибель одного станет причиной разрушения всего кабала... то я рад тебя разочаровать".

traits.locale_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “黑心阴谋团由许多执政官统治，猴子。如果你指望某个人死了，整个阴谋团就会覆灭的话……那我很乐意浇灭你那不切实际的幻想。”
languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

traits.locale_text: “黑心阴谋团由许多执政官统治，猴子。如果你指望某个人死了，整个阴谋团就会覆灭的话……那我很乐意浇灭你那不切实际的幻想。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Nombre d'archontes dirigent le Cœur Noir, mon-keigh. Si vous escomptiez que la mort de l'un d'entre eux entraîne la destruction de toute la Kabale... je suis ravi de vous apprendre que vous vous mettez le doigt dans l'œil jusqu'au coude. »
languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

traits.locale_text: « Nombre d'archontes dirigent le Cœur Noir, mon-keigh. Si vous escomptiez que la mort de l'un d'entre eux entraîne la destruction de toute la Kabale... je suis ravi de vous apprendre que vous vous mettez le doigt dans l'œil jusqu'au coude. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «En el Corazón Negro hay numerosos Arcontes, mon-keigh. Si esperabas que la muerte de uno de ellos ocasionara la caída de toda la Kábala... me alegro de poder decepcionarte».
languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

traits.locale_text: «En el Corazón Negro hay numerosos Arcontes, mon-keigh. Si esperabas que la muerte de uno de ellos ocasionara la caída de toda la Kábala... me alegro de poder decepcionarte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「いいかモン＝ケイ、ブラックハートは多くのアーコンによって支配されている。1人の死が全陰謀団の滅亡の原因になると期待してタノなら…俺はお前を失望させることできて嬉しいぜ」
languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

traits.locale_text: 「いいかモン＝ケイ、ブラックハートは多くのアーコンによって支配されている。1人の死が全陰謀団の滅亡の原因になると期待してタノなら…俺はお前を失望させることできて嬉しいぜ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Das Schwarze Herz wird von vielen Archonten regiert, Chem-Pan-Sey. Falls Ihr darauf gezählt habt, dass der Tod eines einzigen davon die gesamte Kabale vernichtet ... dann bin ich froh, Euch enttäuschen zu können."
languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

traits.locale_text: "Das Schwarze Herz wird von vielen Archonten regiert, Chem-Pan-Sey. Falls Ihr darauf gezählt habt, dass der Tod eines einzigen davon die gesamte Kabale vernichtet ... dann bin ich froh, Euch enttäuschen zu können."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

languages.text: "Kara Yürek birçok Arkon tarafından yönetiliyor mon-keigh. Tek birini öldürmenin koca Kabal'ın yıkılışına sebep olacağını sandıysan hayal kırıklığına uğrayacağın için mutluyum."
languages.original_text: "The Black Heart is ruled by many Archons, mon-keigh. If you were counting on the death of one to be the cause of the destruction of the entire Kabal... then I am glad to disappoint you."

traits.locale_text: "Kara Yürek birçok Arkon tarafından yönetiliyor mon-keigh. Tek birini öldürmenin koca Kabal'ın yok olmasına sebep olacağını sandıysan hayal kırıklığına uğrayacağın için mutluyum."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
